description: 预览多种文件格式，包括Markdown, ReStructured Text, HTML, Jade, Pug, Image, CSS, Mermaid.
config.markdown.abbr.enabled: 在内置Markdown预览中启用/禁用缩写元素（<abbr>）生成。
config.markdown.anchor.enabled: 在内置Markdown预览中启用/禁用标题锚点（#id）生成。
config.markdown.attrs.enabled: 在内置Markdown预览中启用/禁用类名（.class）、全文档唯一标识符ID（#id）、属性（name="value"）生成。
config.markdown.attrs.allowedAttributes: 允许生成的属性列表, 为空则允许全部属性，目前仅支持class，id及属性名称，属性名可以为正则，如/^regex.*$/。
config.markdown.bracketed-spans.enabled: 在内置Markdown预览中span标签（<span>）生成。
config.markdown.cjk-breaks.enabled: 在内置Markdown预览中抑制东亚字符之间的换行（东亚字符无需空格分割单词）。
config.markdown.deflist.enabled: 在内置Markdown预览中启用/禁用描述列表元素（<dl>）生成。
config.markdown.emoji.enabled: 在内置Markdown预览中启用/禁用绘文字、颜文字（表情符号）及表情符号缩写渲染。
config.markdown.expand-tabs.enabled: 在内置Markdown预览中启用/禁用代码块中前置制表符转换为空格。
config.markdown.expand-tabs.tabWidth: 指定替换每个前置制表符的空格个数。
config.markdown.footnote.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.highlightjs.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.html.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.ins.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.lazy-headers.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.mark.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.markdown.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.mermaid.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.pug.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.rst.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.sub.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.sup.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.task-lists.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
